actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to the order of Thursday, April 13, 2023,  the Journal of the proceedings of the Senate was deemed approved to date.
Pursuant to the order of Thursday, April 13, 2023, the morning hour being deemed expired, and the times for the recognition of the two leaders being reserved.
The following transactions of morning business occurred on today.

PN5:
        Radha Iyengar Plumb, of New York, to be a Deputy Under Secretary of Defense

        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- Cloture invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 26. Record Vote Number: 83 


        -- By unanimous consent agreement, debate and vote 4/18/2023.
By unanimous consent, on the request of Ms. Stabenow, at 6:28 p.m., the Senate adjourned, under its order of today, until 10 a.m. tomorrow.
